name: Adult diapers
description: Frail senior needs diapers as he is unable to walk quickly to the toilet in time and often soils himself.

contact.org: Allkin Singapore's Active Ageing Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 469
contact.name: Kei Ng

name: Diapers
description:
Hi, there is a household of 6 who requires diapers for 2 of their young children. Husband is certified temporarily unfit for work as he is required to be the main caregiver for his wife and children. Wife was a victim of a scam which led to huge financial losses. With their lack of income and financial strain, they would require diaper support for the children. Here are the diaper details: Diapers Type 1
Brand: Merries
Size: XL
Type: Pants, 

Diapers Type 2
Brand: Merries 
Size: XXL 
Type: Pants

Thank you.

name: Diapers
description: Client is a full-time caregiver to her two young children. The family is living in a rental flat, with the husband being the sole breadwinner. Client will require assistance in getting diapers (Size M and XL - 2 packets each).

Good working condition

name: Oven
description: Client is unemployed and currently 7 months pregnant. There is no working adult in the family. Client hopes to have an oven (halal) so that she could learn baking and potentially start a business. Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 or email to odelia.teo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Lynette Tan

passiton.name: Oven Toaster
passiton.dimensions: L38 X W22 X H20 cm

name: Oxygen Concentrator
description:
74-year-old elderly lady has late-stage cancer. She requires an oxygen concentrator to help with breathlessness. Family has financial difficulties and is unable to afford the cost of renting or buying one. Looking for a donor who has a secondhand one in good condition. 

Pls contact me at 97274215 via Whatsapp. Thank you.

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator Machine
passiton.description: Oxygen Concentrator machine with original manual and box.

name: Adult diapers
description:
Client is an elderly man with various medical health conditions preventing him from being able to manage activities such as going to the toilet without support from his son. 

As such, he is reliant on adult diapers and we would like to request for any amount of diapers possible to assist as the family is facing financial difficulties. Client is not particular with brand.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Muhammad Redha Bin Ahmad Razif

name: Adult diapers
description: An elderly woman is taking care of her husband, who has dementia and has suffered a mild stroke, leading to incontinence. As a result, he needs frequent diaper changes every day. Unfortunately, they are both unemployed and struggling financially. The woman is kindly asking for help in getting FairPrice XL-sized adult diapers pants, as the ongoing expense has become a significant burden for them.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Services - Mental Health
contact.name: Chris Tan

name: Wheelchair
description: Client comes from a low-income family. He is an above-knee bilateral amputee and would require a 4-wheeler motorised Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to travel around for his medical appointments and to seek employment.

passiton.name: WheelChair
passiton.description:
Wheelchair is older than 4 years old. is the heavier metal model. bought a replacement lighter model for my mom and thus have this as a spare sitting in the storeroom. 

item is still good condition with the basic function still working. (brakes, seats, footrest etc)

name: Sofa
description: The client is a single mom of 2 young children and is currently pregnant. She is unemployed and only depends on Comcare financial assistance, which is insufficient for her family. She just moved to her new rental flat and needs a sofa and TV for her new house. She would appreciate it if a kind donor could help her with the items for her new house.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Joel Tay

passiton.name: 2.5 seater Sofa
passiton.description: White pre-loved sofa in good condition. Adjustable head rest.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

passiton.name: 3-Seater Leather Recliner Sofa with Cover!
passiton.description:
Upgrade your living space with this comfortable 3-seater leather recliner sofa, available for free! Used for 3 years, it features a reclining function for ultimate relaxation. The leather shows some wear, but a stylish cover is included to keep it looking fresh.
Condition: Used, leather slightly worn
Features: Recliner function, cover included
Collection: Self-collection only 
Grab this opportunity to enhance your home at no cost! Contact me to arrange a pickup.

name: Dining Table
description:
Client is a single mother to 4 school-going children. Client and her children were seeking accommodation at her parent's residence whilst she was undergoing divorce proceedings. Client had to forgo her job in order to navigate
settling her divorce and managing the caregiving needs of the children and was dependent on community agencies in sustaining the basic needs of the family. Client recently secured a HDB rental flat following finalisation of her divorce and hopes to seek support in securing preloved essential household items for her new home. Client is in the midst of exploring job opportunities and at present has scarce financial resources for furnishing her new home.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre – Hougang and Buangkok
contact.name: Sabrina Than

passiton.name: Wood dining table
passiton.description: Wooden & sturdy dining table. But too big for my small flat & I am stayimg alone.
